title: Jameela Jamil looks uber stylish in emerald silk floral trouser suit
text:
She is a Stateside sensation who is known for her edgy sartorial ensembles.

And Jameela Jamil looked incredible as she made a stylish appearance at New York Comic Con 2019 on Friday.

The Good Place star, 33, caught the eye in a striking emerald green trouser suit adorned with navy floral designs.

Vibrant: Jameela Jamil looked incredible as she made a stylish appearance at New York Comic Con 2019 on Friday

The star revealed her slender frame in a chic shimmering 80s-inspired blazer which she paired with matching culottes.

The beauty boosted her statuesque frame with black stiletto heels.

Her raven tresses were styled in soft waves while her pretty features were enhanced with feline flicks of liner and a coral lipstick.

As the star took to the stage, she kicked off her shoes and went barefoot as she chatted.

Jameela has recently been promoting her new TBS game show The Misery Index.

Style: The Good Place star, 33, caught the eye in a striking emerald green trouser suit adorned with navy floral designs

Relaxed: As the star took to the stage, she kicked off her shoes and went barefoot as she chatted

Jamil hosts the program, with Joe Gatto and his Impractical Jokers co-stars Brian Quinn, James Murray and Sal Vulcano serving as recurring panelists with the comedy troupe The Tenderloins teaming up with contestants.

The game will feature two teams, each consisting of one contestant and one Tenderloin member, who, 'compete in a game of stakes ranking hysterically miserable real-life experiences - from getting stuck overnight in an elevator to walking in on your grandparents having sex.'

These experiences are graded on a scale of 1-100, known as The Misery Index, a ranking system created by a team of therapists.

Radiant: Her raven tresses were styled in soft waves while her pretty features were enhanced with feline flicks of liner and a coral lipstick

Jamil also stars as Tahani Al-Jamil on NBC's hit comedy series The Good Place, which is currently airing its fourth and final season.

She also stars in How to Build a Girl, alongside Emma Thompson, Sharon Horgan and Beanie Feldstein, which doesn't have a release date yet.

The actress also voices Pushpa in the upcoming animated series Mira, Royal Detective, which doesn't have a premiere date either.
description: Jameela Jamil looked incredible as she made a stylish appearance at New York Comic Con 2019 on Friday.
